question: What was the maximum limit of Statutory Liquidity Ratio had Narasimham Committee recommended?
explanation: The Narasimham Committee had recommended bringing down the statutory pre-emptions such as SLR and CRR. It recommended that SLR should be reduced to 25% over the period of time and CRR should be reduced to 10% over the period of time and CRR should be reduced to 10% over the period of time.
